name: 2022Word
description:
2022word

is a simple and fine game. In the game, you can press the space bar to start the ball to destroy the box. 2022word is also a decompression game, which is suitable for children
There are three levels in 2022 word. If you can't play it, you can unlock it directly. In 2022 word, the blocks in the game will be under pressure and get off the shelf over time, so we have to eliminate the blocks as soon as possible
This is a puzzle game, suitable for children's games. Here comes an exciting agile game! In the game, players need to launch a small ball to hit a brick, and move the brick below to catch the small ball to prevent it from falling. But pay attention, there are only three opportunities! Only the winner can enter the next level!
